features: 【Compatible Models】Shark mop pads compatible with Shark Steam Mop S1000, S1000A, S1000C, S1000WM, S1001C, S1200.
【More Effective】Easy-glide microfiber pad effortlessly glides across the floor locking in dirt and grime.
【Fit for All Hard Floors】S1000 steam mop pads are designed to use on all smooth sealed hard floors. like wooden floors, ceramic tile, laminate floors, marble floors.
【Velcro Installation】S1000wm steam mop pads refills feature a user-friendly velcro fastener, making installation and replacement a breeze for anyone.
【Money Saving】The package includes 8 pcs replacement pads for shark s1000 series steam mop, reusable and machine washable. Save your money!
body.description: Compatible with Shark Steam Mop S1000, S1000A, S1000C, S1000WM, S1001C, S1200. Contains 8 Pack Washable Microfiber Mop Pads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Maximizing Mop Performance
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a Shark mop a few months ago, and it only came with one mop pad. It felt wasteful to toss just one pad into the washer every time I needed to clean it! Plus, halfway through my mopping session, the pad would become saturated with water. As a result, the last half of my kitchen always ended up too wet, with noticeable water marks.These additional pads are identical to the one that came with the mop. They are the same size and even have the same pattern. Now, I can mop halfway through, and switch to a fresh pad when the first one becomes too damp! I highly recommend these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extra mop pads...exactly what you think!
reviews.reviewText: I got these for my wife who was tired of running out of clean steam mop pads when cleaning up our mess of tile floors. They are of equal quality to the ones that originally came with our mop. They fit our mop perfectly. They also perform well. There really isn't much else to say...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large and super absorbent
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I need for my shark steam mop replacement pads. They are slightly larger than i need but love the extra coverage. These are more absorbent compared to another brand bought a few years ago. 8 pieces are plenty to last for a while. Wash up easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit for Shark!
reviews.reviewText: These replacement pads are a perfect fit. The quality is very close to the original, and the best part is, they’re a lot cheaper!I really can’t find anything bad about them, so definitely buy with confidence.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These just came and they fit perfectly. The look and feel exactly the same at a fraction of the cost. When I say they are exactly the same I mean it. They pick up the dirt and grime easily. Can be thrown in the washer with mild detergent (no softeners) and I air dry mine.
